mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.specialty AS "specialty", a.professional_title AS "professionalTitle", a.tel AS "tel", a.company AS "company", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bas_expert a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.name LIKE concat(#{name},'%')
AND a.professional_title LIKE concat(#{professionalTitle},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bas_expert( id, name, specialty, professional_title, tel, company, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{specialty}, #{professionalTitle}, #{tel}, #{company}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bas_expert SET name = #{name}, specialty = #{specialty}, professional_title = #{professionalTitle}, tel = #{tel}, company = #{company}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
